name: Pixel Liberator
description:
Liberate the galaxy from the evil empires.

An 8bit retro shoot’em up. Steer your ship through fifty levels full of pixelated foes. Earn credits and buy new weapons and ships. Are you the liberator the universe has been waiting for?

Pixel Liberator is a causal game with unexpected depth. Placed in a nostalgic universe where everyone wants to turn your ship into space pixels.

Simple controls by just pressing left or right side of the screen.

- 52 Levels to beat
- 13 Distinct empires to destroy.
- 16 Different ships to fly
- 20 Weapons to choose from
- More than 30 other equipment choices for your ship.
- Hours of fun.

Enjoy-
